name: Animals Memory: Cats
description:
Animals Memory: Cats is a card game with pictures of different cats that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards. This part of the game more difficult to pass than the first part of the game "Animals Memory" because here the images are cats, and because of this can be confusing.

game Features:
- Different levels of difficulty. From simple to complex.
- 49 cards with images of cats.
- It develops memory and is suitable for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children, teenagers and adults.
- 18 levels. Ranging from lightweight to large and complex levels.
